TimelineContent.heroTitle: Jien fondatur minn Ingilterra qed nomading madwar US/UK/EU fl-AirBnb's. Interessat nikun fil-crypto, startups u softwer development. GÄ§andi sfond fil-venture capital u l-acting.
TimelineContent.timeline2025Title: IlÄ§aqt LiquidOps mainnet u ffokussajna fuq it-tkabbir
TimelineContent.timeline2025Description: Din is-sena qaddijtna l-Ä§in tiegÄ§i fil-Ä§olqien ta' [mainnet ta' LiquidOps](https://x.com/Liquid_Ops/status/1905268807746060790?s=20). WaÄ§da mill-aktar lezzjonijiet ta' valur li tgÄ§allimt din is-sena hija li l-startups mhux biss dwar il-prodott. It-tkabbir u l-marketing huma importanti daqs (jekk le aktar) minn il-prodott, gÄ§alhekk bdejt [noÄ§loq kontenut](/projects#content-creator) u ffokussajna fuq it-tkabbir.
TimelineContent.timeline2024Description: Ä ejt ix-idea [LiquidOps](/projects#liquidops) ma' [Marton Lederer](https://x.com/martonlederer) din is-sena wara mixja ambizzjuÅ¼a mfulija f'Cambridge fejn kont niskun dak il-Ä§in. [AO](https://ao.arweave.net) kien fl-infancy u harsa malajr il-potenzjal gÄ§al mod biex ma' leverage il-likwiditÃ  tal-ekosistema. Ä¦dejt ukoll bÄ§ala Engineering Partner fuq [AO Ventures](https://aoventures.io). I supported teams in the cohort and helped decide who participated in demo day from a technical perspective, I ended up also participating with my new idea - [LiquidOps](/projects#liquidops).
TimelineContent.timeline2023Description: Sar jien l-ewwel external Fellow f'[Community Labs](https://communitylabs.com) dritt wara r-round ta' seed. ErÄ¡ejna l-[Wallety](/projects#wallety) grant biex niffoka biss fuq l-[Arweave](https://arweave.org) ecosystem. Matul il-Ä§in tiegÄ§i hawn ibnejt [Othent](/projects#othent), Oases u [Subsidise.js](/projects#subsidisejs).
TimelineContent.timeline2022Title: Ä¦adt Community Labs & tgÄ§allamt liex kodifikar
TimelineContent.timeline2022Description: Wara li rrealizÅ¼ajt li l-investiment ma kienx jixgÄ§alni daqs ma Ä§add jagÄ§mel, Ä§adt fuq missjoni biex nitgÄ§allem programmazzjoni minn xejn. NitgÄ§allimt programmazzjoni malajr u bnejt l-ewwel proÄ¡ett tiegÄ§i [Wallety](/projects#wallety). Kien strenuuÅ¼ imma emozjonanti Ä§afna. ImbagÄ§ad Ä¡ibdejt l-attenzjoni ta' [Tate Berenbaum](https://x.com/TateBerenbaum) li sar Ä§abib viÄ‹in u iddecidejt li nÄ§aqqqu magÄ§h f'[Community Labs](https://communitylabs.com) bÄ§ala l-ewwel Fellow tagÄ§hom minn barra.
TimelineContent.timeline2021Description: Landejt staj unpaid f'fond ta' venture capital tal-crypto minn is-sena preÄ‹edenti tal-cold emailing. Ä¦dejt gÄ§al 3 xhur mingÄ§ajr Ä§las qabel ma offraw li Ä§dej bÄ§ala analyst tal-Ä§las, imbagÄ§ad Ä§dejt fuq il-venture u hedge funds tagÄ§hom gÄ§al is-sena li jmiss. Spendejt il-Ä§in tiegÄ§i prinÄ‹ipalment qed nagÄ§mel due diligence fuq dealflow, notes f'gÄ§onq settimanali investment communitee meetings u meet ma' founders li ridu pitch il-firm. Matul is-sena din Ä§dejt volontarju bÄ§ala [Polkadot Ambassador](https://polkadot.com/community/ambassador-program) fejn gÄ§onaqt ibni l-komunitÃ  u Ä§adt IRL London picnic fejn fuq 100 persuna dawru inkluÅ¼ ecosystem teams u founders.
TimelineContent.timeline2020Title: Crypto Teen & throwing out ta' drama school
TimelineContent.timeline2020Description: Habiba kont tattendi drama school f'[Emil Dale Academy](https://www.emildale.co.uk), bdejt Crypto TikTok educational channel li kienet gÄ§all-edukazzjoni Gen Z fuq Crypto. Biex inkisser l-industrija Ä§adt deÄ‹iÅ¼joni li cold email fuq 500 kumpanija, investment firms u proÄ¡etti jekk jÄ§adukx bÄ§ala unpaid worker. Minn aktar minn 500 emails fuq 6 hit. UÅ¼ejt Ä§adna Zoom meetings f'car park tal-iskola ma' phone tal-classmates tiegÄ§i li kienet gÄ§andu data habila kont iskip classes biex pitch VCs u businesses dwar potenzjal hiring. Kien verament surreal Ä§in fil-Ä§ajja tiegÄ§i u mhu biss keep getting more surreal since. Din ukoll kienet is-sena li fundrarajt gÄ§al Drama School bix-xtri tal-Ä§amrija tal-imgÄ§oddija/affarijiet biex resell fuq eBay biex Ä§las tuition fees wara inspjrazzjoni minn Gary Vee, Ä§ad.
TimelineContent.timeline2019Description: Ä¦adt il-komunitÃ  Ethereum fl-2019 wara li tgÄ§allem dwar smart contracts.
TimelineContent.timeline2017Description: Habiba l-klassmejt tiegÄ§i Ä§olqu qed ibgÄ§atu candy gÄ§al xi raÄ¡uni, jien kont qed issalvaÄ§ telefon screens gÄ§al cash.

AngelPage.title: Angel Investing
introAndElevator: Jien nÄ§obb imkabbar ma' founders li jibnu xi Ä§aÄ¡a li verament jkunu kuljati. Meta nara potenzjal u modi li nista' ngÄ§in lil hinn mill-kapital, nkun eager biex ndaÄ§Ä§al kmieni.

Normalment nikteb checks bejn **$500 u $5,000** f'pre-seed u verament early seed rounds. GÄ§alkemm ma niktebx l-aqbar checks, nipprova nkun utli. Jekk dik introduzzjonijiet, feedback fuq il-prodott, nassiÄ§a teknika, jew biss ikun xi Ä§add biex talkaw minn-problemi, ara more in depth information fuq dak li nagÄ§mel hawn taÄ§t.

Disclosure, jien attwalmentfull-time founder u ppjan li nkun wieÄ§ed gÄ§all-foreseeable future, allura ma nistax allocate full-time attenzjoni gÄ§al portfolio companies. Normalment biex invest biss f'kumpaniji li qed jibnu f'ambjenti simili gÄ§al dak li jien attwalment jew inbunejt fil-passat, allura nista' directly ngÄ§in mal-problem-solving. TraÄ¡ ara aktar [angel investing disclosures](/disclosures).

helpItems: Ma nista' nassiÄ§ak fuq legal/accounting issues, iÅ¼da nista' indirezzak lejn dak li jistgÄ§u jgÄ§inu â€” lawyers, accountants, u professionals (u nipprova tassiguraw li int mhux getting scammed ma' high fees). Sal-data nixtret 4 limited companies fl-UK u 1 Delaware C corporation.

content.content: Din il-paÄ¡na fih important disclosures dwar il-angel investing activities tiegÄ§i. TraÄ¡ aqra din l-informazzjoni b'attenzjoni qabel ma tikkomunika milli tiegÄ§i dwar investment opportunities.
Personal Capital Only

Jien ninvest il-flus personali tiegÄ§i. Jien **mhu** venture capital fund, jien **mhu** manage fund, u jien **mhu** accept capital minn limited partners (LPs) jew any other external investors. Il-investment decisions Ä§olqu made solely by jien using il-flus tiegÄ§i stess.
Not Investment Advice

Xejn fuq il-website din gÄ§andu jkun construed as investment, legal, accounting, tax, jew life advice. Jien **mhu** authorised jew regulated minn Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) jew any other financial regulatory body. Any investment decisions li ttagÄ§mel huma responsibility tiegÄ§ek stess.
No Fiduciary Duty
Jien ma' owe any fiduciary duty lil founders jew companies li jinvest fihom lil hinn dak li set out f'relevant investment documentation. Jien investor, mhu advisor, director, jew fiduciary.
Not a Solicitation

Xejn fuq il-website din constitute solicitation, offer, jew recommendation biex tinvest f'any company, security, jew investment product. Any information dwar il-portfolio companies tiegÄ§i hu gÄ§all-informational purposes biss.
No Guarantee of Investment
Tikkomunika milli jew sending pitch tiegÄ§ek ma' **jambigwita** li jien ninvest. Jien review opportunities selectively u ninvest f'very few companies each year (maximum 1-2).
Limited Availability

Jien attwalmentfull-time founder u ppjan li nkun wieÄ§ed gÄ§all-foreseeable future, allura ma nistax allocate full-time attenzjoni gÄ§al portfolio companies. Normalment biex invest biss f'kumpaniji li qed jibnu f'ambjenti simili gÄ§al dak li jien attwalment jew inbunejt fil-passat, allura nista' directly ngÄ§in mal-problem-solving.
No Advisory Relationships

Jien mhu advise companies jew founders. Jien jaÄ§seb advisors jiddun misaligned (unless gÄ§al really late-stage companies) â€” [watch Steve Jobs explain why](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-c4CNB80SRc). Jien biss angel invest f'founders u ideas li jien irrid idaÄ§Ä§al ma' u jaÄ§seb li nista' ngÄ§in ibni.
Early Stage Focus

Jien probabbli mhu going to jkun helpful lil later-stage founders. Jien early stage myself u nista' l-best ngÄ§in nies f'earliest stages (qabel Series A). IÅ¼da jekk int late-stage founder u jaÄ§seb li jien nista' nkun helpful, jien still interested.
Tax Considerations

Any tax reliefs mentioned (such as SEIS jew EIS) huma subject to individual circumstances u HMRC rules. Int gÄ§andu tfittex independent tax advice. Jien ma' make xejn representations dwar tax status ta' any investment.
Confidentiality

Jekk int share confidential information ma' jien, jien treat it ma' reasonable care, iÅ¼da jien ma' nista' jambigwita absolute confidentiality. Jien jista' exposed to similar ideas minn other founders. Ma ja' share information li int ma' comfortable disclosing. Unless jien have signed separate written confidentiality agreement ma' int, jien have no obligation biex treat information li int send lili as confidential.
Conflicts of Interest

Jien jista' ninvest f'kumpaniji li compete ma' xulxin jew ma' companies li int qed tibni. Jien jissu under no obligation biex disclose il-investments oÄ§ra tiegÄ§i lak, u jien jissu under no obligation biex refrain minn investing f'competing companies.
Risk Warning

**Angel investing f'early-stage companies involve high degree of risk.** Int jista' lose il-investment kollu tiegÄ§ek. Past performance ma hu' indicative of future results. Il-valur ta' investments jista' jmorru down kif ukoll up. Early-stage investments jiddun illiquid u int jista' mhux jkun able biex sell shares tiegÄ§ek gÄ§al Ä§afna snin, jekk ever.

content.title: UK Investor Status
content.content: Jien **Self-Certified Sophisticated Investor** taÄ§t Financial Services u Markets Act 2000 (Financial Promotion) Order 2005. Jien qualify fuq il-basi ta' Ä§dejt professional capacity f'provision ta' finance gÄ§al small u medium enterprises within il-last two years (bÄ§ala contractor gÄ§al blockchain accelerator programs involving early-stage investment).
content.note: **GÄ§al Founders:** Billi int share investment materials ma' jien, int confirm li int conduct appropriate checks taÄ§t UK Financial Promotions regime u reasonably believe li jien eligible biex receive such communications. Jekk int need lili biex sign self-certification form qabel sharing il-pitch tiegÄ§ek, jien happy biex agÄ§mel.

Agreement to Terms

Submissions and Communications

Disclaimer of Warranties

Limitation of Liability

**SAX IL-FULLEST EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, LORIMER JENKINS SHALL NOT JKU LIABLE GÄ¦AL ANY** indirect, incidental, special, consequential, jew punitive damages, loss ta' profits, revenue, data, jew use, damages arising minn il-use tiegÄ§ek ta' il-Site, investment losses, jew damages minn reliance fuq any information fuq din Site.

Indemnification

Jien reserve il-right biex modify dawn Terms any time. Changes jkun effective immediately upon posting ma' updated "Last Updated" date. Il-continued use tiegÄ§ek ta' il-Site after changes constitute acceptance ta' il-modified Terms.
Governing Law

Dawn Terms jkun governed minn u construed f'accordance ma' il-laws ta' England u Wales. Any disputes jkun resolved through good faith negotiation, u jekk li fails, il-courts ta' England u Wales jkun have exclusive jurisdiction.

Contact
Jekk int have any questions dwar dawn Terms, traÄ¡ contact lili f' hellolorimerjenkins@gmail.com.
Billi int use il-Site, int acknowledge li int read, understood, u agree biex ikun bound minn dawn Terms of Service.
Introduction
Welcome lil lorimerjenkins.com (il-"Site"). Din Privacy Policy explains how Lorimer Jenkins ("I," "me," jew "my") collects, uses, u protects information meta int visit din personal website.
Information I Collect
Automatically Collected Information
Meta int visit il-Site, jien automatically collect certain information through Google Analytics, inkluÅ¼:

items: Pages li int visit u time spent fuq each page
Date u time ta' il-visit tiegÄ§ek

content.content: Information You Provide
Attwalmentally, din Site mhu collect personal information directly minn users through forms jew accounts, ma' l-exception li jmiss:

**Angel Investing Enquiries:** Jekk int contact lili regarding angel investment opportunities via email, jien jista' receive u store information li int choose biex provide, inkluÅ¼ il-name tiegÄ§ek, email address, company information, pitch materials, u any other information contained f'il-correspondence tiegÄ§ek.
How I Use Your Information
Jien use il-information collected through Google Analytics biex understand how visitors use il-Site, improve content u user experience, analyse traffic patterns, u monitor Site performance.
Jien use information provided via angel investing enquiries biex evaluate potential investment opportunities, communicate ma' founders, u maintain records ta' investment-related correspondence.
Google Analytics

Din Site uses Google Analytics, web analytics service provided minn Google LLC. Google Analytics uses cookies biex help analyse how users interact ma' il-Site. GÄ§al more information dwar how Google uses data, traÄ¡ visit: [Google's Privacy Policy](https://policies.google.com/technologies/partner-sites)
Opting Out

Int jista' opt out ta' Google Analytics billi install il-[Google Analytics Opt-out Browser Add-on](https://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout) jew adjusting il-browser settings tiegÄ§ek biex block jew delete cookies.
Cookies

Cookies jiddun small text files stored fuq il-device tiegÄ§ek. Din Site uses cookies biss through Google Analytics gÄ§all-purposes described above. Int jista' control cookie preferences through il-browser settings tiegÄ§ek.
Data Retention

Google Analytics data retained gÄ§al 26 months minn il-date ta' collection, after li automatically deleted. Information provided via angel investing enquiries retained gÄ§al as long as reasonably necessary jew as required minn law.
Angel Investing Communications
Jekk int send lili pitch materials jew other investment-related information:

items: Jien treat il-information tiegÄ§ek ma' reasonable care
Jien jista' share information ma' professional advisors taÄ§t confidentiality obligations fejn necessary

Jien mhu sell jew share il-information tiegÄ§ek ma' third parties gÄ§al marketing purposes

Il-Site jista' contain links lil third-party websites. Jien mhu responsible gÄ§al il-privacy practices ta' dawn external sites. Jien encourage int biex review il-privacy policies tagÄ§hom.
Your Rights

Depending fuq il-location tiegÄ§ek, int jista' have certain rights regarding il-data tiegÄ§ek, inkluÅ¼ il-right biex access information li jien hold dwar int, request deletion ta' il-data tiegÄ§ek, object lil processing, u data portability. Biex exercise dawn rights, traÄ¡ contact lili f' hellolorimerjenkins@gmail.com.
For EU Visitors (GDPR)

Jekk int located f'European Union, int have additional rights taÄ§t General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). Il-legal basis gÄ§al processing ta' il-data tiegÄ§ek huwa legitimate interest f'improving u analysing il-Site, u gÄ§al angel investing communications, legitimate interest f'evaluating potential investment opportunities.
For California Visitors (CCPA)
Jekk int California resident, int have rights taÄ§t California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA), inkluÅ¼ il-right biex know dwar xi personal information collected u il-right biex request deletion.
Children's Privacy

Din Site mhu directed lil children taÄ§t age ta' 18. Jien mhu knowingly collect personal information minn children taÄ§t 18. Jekk int believe li jien inadvertently collected such information, traÄ¡ contact lili biex have it removed.
Changes to This Policy
Jien jista' update din Privacy Policy minn time lil time. Any changes jkun posted fuq din page ma' updated "Last Updated" date.
Security

While jien strive biex protect il-information tiegÄ§ek, no method ta' transmission over il-internet huwa 100% secure. Jien ma' nista' jambigwita absolute security ta' data transmitted to jew stored fuq il-Site.
Contact

ProjectsPage.walletyDescription: Website tal-analitika ta' [Polkadot](https://polkadot.com) u [Kusama](https://kusama.network/), li kellet il-gÄ§an li turi lill-utenti analitika utli dwar il-kartini tiegÄ§hom bÄ§al xpejjez, uÅ¼u ta' kull xahar, esportazzjoni CSV u flus pagati fi Ä§lasijiet tal-netwerk. ProjectsPage.othentDescription: Il-mission ta' [Othent](https://othent.io) kienet biex enable normal everyday online consumers biex access blockchain projects, mingÄ§ajr l-use ta' complex cryptographic private keys u instead use any Oauth account access like Google. [Othent](https://othent.io) Ä¡iet then aquired minn [Wander](https://wander.app) f'il-core product tagÄ§hom, [Arweave](https://arweave.org) & [AO](https://ao.arweave.net) ecosystem Web3 wallet li has fuq 50,000 users, jibÄ§al [Wander Connect](https://www.wander.app/connect).
ProjectsPage.liquidOpsDescription: Protokoll ta' presliem u stÄ§arriÄ¡ mibnija fuq [AO](https://ao.arweave.net), li gÄ§andha l-gÄ§an li tiftaÄ§ iktar minn $400m ta' valur tat-tokens ta' [Arweave](https://arweave.org). Ä¦otna l-proÄ¡ett flimkien ma' [Marton Lederer](https://x.com/martonlederer), sibna l-ewwel kumpanija mmeneÄ¡Ä¡jata minn Fellow li Ä§arÄ¡et minn [Community Labs](https://www.communitylabs.com), atranna eluf ta' [waitlist](https://x.com/Liquid_Ops/status/1863863983498805473?s=20) signups li kkummerÄ‹jalizzajna gÄ§al $55m soft-commits gÄ§all-idea b'verifika tal-fondi on-chain, [ippreÅ¼entajna](https://x.com/aoTheVentures/status/1813676139795374171?s=20) fil-[AO Ventures](https://www.aoventures.io) demo day u mbagÄ§ad gÄ§aqalna [$325k pre-seed round](https://www.ibtimes.co.uk/revolutionizing-defi-how-lorimer-jenkins-marton-lederer-are-transforming-arweave-liquidops-1729945). Ä¦alÄ§alqilna l-mainnet, gÄ§andna integrazzjonijiet numru bÄ§all-AO Chrome/IOS/Android wallets [Wander](https://wander.app) ([demo hawn](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4ODxijaC0Dc)) u [Beacon](https://getbeaconapp.com) ([demo hawn](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GeQ01-rBUPQ&t=11s)). Ä¦alÄ§alqilna wkoll u gÄ§addinna l-audits mill-firmijiet [Spearbit](https://cantina.xyz/solutions/spearbit) u [Quantstamp](https://quantstamp.com/).
ProjectsPage.contentCreationDescription: NoÄ§loq kontenut tal-vidjo fuq il-platafformi tal-midja soÄ‹jali l-kbar kollha. InÄ‹entrali gÄ§al dan li jkun mod eÄ‹Ä‹ellenti biex nibni l-komunitÃ  online tiegÄ§i, nuri lid-dinja x'qegÄ§din naÄ§dem fuqha u nilqa' nies Ä¡odda f'postijiet Ä¡odda. Bdeyt ukoll podcast imsejjaÄ§ [Lorimer's Podcast](/#podcast).
ProjectsPage.cryptoTeenDescription: [Crypto Teen](https://www.tiktok.com/@lorimer__jenkins) huwa cryptocurrency TikTok channel aiming biex educate Gen Z fuq xi hu crypto, covering basic concepts u know-how f'Web3 blockchain space.
ProjectsPage.subsidisejsDescription: Subsidise JS huwa package built biex enable [Arweave 4096-bit RSA-PSS JWK's](https://medium.com/@perma_dao/wallet-and-did-in-the-arweave-ecosystem-5714877fe745) biex bundle transactions flimkien u pay gas fees gÄ§al other users transactions via [ANS-102](https://github.com/ArweaveTeam/arweave-standards/blob/master/ans/ANS-102.md) Arweave network standard. Jien planned biex intergrate dan f'other projects li wanted biex cover il-users gas upload fees tagÄ§hom, li enable users biex mhu have biex pay AR tokens biex use Web 2 consuer app built fuq Arweave.
ProjectsPage.astroDescription: Astro huwa liquidity solution built gÄ§al seamless integration within Web3 ecosystems. Billi jien aggregate multiple stablecoins u fiat currencies f'single, unified asset - USDA, Astro ensures frictionless value exchange bejn real-world u on-chain applications.
ProjectsPage.coolarweaveaddressDescription: Din repo allows int biex generate Ä§afna [Arweave 4096-bit RSA-PSS JWK's](https://medium.com/@perma_dao/wallet-and-did-in-the-arweave-ecosystem-5714877fe745) biex find cool u unique wallet addresses. Claude automatically detect il-cool addresses based fuq il-desired parameters tiegÄ§ek.
ProjectsPage.aothecomputerDescription: Ä¦abib gÄ§edda li tafi storiella dwar li kien jista' jikseb domain li kien xieraq Ä§afna gÄ§al xejn prattikament, kont mir-meravlja (u xi ftit Ä§sud ukoll) u ma stajtx wisq insett il-Ä§sib fuq il-deal Ä§amli li gÄ§amel. GÄ§alhekk bdejt niftaÄ§Ä§ar f'Namecheap biex ara jekk kien hemm deals Ä§amla oÄ§ra. Ileq [AO The Computer .com](https://aothecomputer.com) kien disponibbli gÄ§at-tixtir gÄ§al $11.48 sena, Å¼omm dak [redacted] ğŸ˜œ.
ProjectsPage.aohtmlDescription: AO HTML hija gÄ§odda li tÄ§allik tÄ§olloq paÄ¡na web permezz ta' file HTML li taÄ¡Ä¡orna awtomatikament ibbaÅ¼ata fuq il-kontenut mogÄ§ti mill-AO network permezz ta' proÄ‹ess. ImmaÄ¡ina websajt deÄ‹entralizzata b'kontenut fornit mill-fornituur deÄ‹entralizzat bÄ§al DAO, pereÅ¼empju il-website taÄ¡Ä¡orna awtomatikament wara li propos DAO Ä¡ie approvat u l-fruntends Web2 kollha fuq Vercel/Netlify wkoll jaÄ¡Ä¡ornawhom permezz ta' din is-skritta.
